UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Cathelicidin-derived Trp/Pro-rich antimicrobial peptides with lysine peptoid residue (Nlys): therapeutic index and plausible mode of action
Literature.Author: Zhu WL, Hahm KS, Shin SY

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli KCTC 1682(MIC=2µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa KCTC 1637(MIC=4µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis KCTC 1917(MIC=1µM),Staphylococcus aureus KCTC 1621(MIC=1µM),Staphylococcus aureus CCARM 3001(MIC=1µM),Staphylococcus aureus CCARM 3543(MIC=0.5µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa CCARM 2095(MIC=4µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa CCARM 2109(MIC=8µM)
